ygData.subject: RE: Grinnenne charm or Griffene charm for Lambent brace rs?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe - Verant typo - yes that is the right charm.  Now you need a Dark Bone Bracelet - from a Dark Bone Skellie in Unrest.  Plus Lambent stone and 2 fire opals
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe - Verant typo - yes that is the right charm. Now you need a Dark Bone
Bracelet - from a Dark Bone Skellie in Unrest. Plus Lambent stone and 2
fire opals that you can buy for 111pp (55pp each) in the temple.

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of the 36th Song
<Spirit of the Moon>
somewhere on Innoruuk


-----Original Message-----
From: Tim Burke [mailto:tjohnburke@...]
Sent: Monday, November 15, 1999 10:04 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Grinnenne charm or Griffene charm for Lambent
bracers?


From: "Tim Burke" <tjohnburke@...>

I just killed a griffene in NK, while kinda sorda. I cords/discords/hymned
until I was down 3 bubbles, and selo'ed/healed - this took about 15 minutes,
then a passing druid finnished it off.

So I loot and I get a Grinnenne charm? Is that the charm I need for lambent
bracers? Whats up with the spelling? and this thing is a bard only lore no
drop 3 ac 3 cha? Is this the right charm, I don't wanna waste the bracelet,
lambent stone and pp if its wrong.

Thanx

Kerouac Dharmabum

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
